text: <@U2H3TT8F2> i’m gonna try it. i made it through the spotify ad before the album, and now i’ve stopped to take a deep breath. because i believe in at least listening to the music i’m going to make fun of.
let me know your thoughts on it. I kinda dig it.

Ok I listened to most of it on a run. No, it's not running music, but my knee is busted so I shouldn't be running at all and that kept me chill. 

It still is not my type of music but it's well put together. Wild Blue is a good track
Not gonna lie, Winger is playing at the arena at the end of my street tonight and they were doing their sound check so I abandoned John Mayer for them
